name: Space Trash (Pikel)
description:
Oh no! There's too much trash in space and no one seems to be picking it up! Sounds like a job for Trash Cat!  Trash Cat uses advanced space trash technology to collect all the space junk that's been floating around. Navigate our hero around space and be sure to not get hit!

This game was made in Flash(Animate?) :^) It's based off a flash tutorial I found on the internet for a class project. Enjoy!
